Preeti wrote:

> Hello,
> 
> I have never used JUnit before. I want to start creating test suite.
 > But I donot know where to get started.

Google "JUnit: A Starter Guide"

> The application to be tested is created using JSP's, Servelets,
> Struts and Java files. It is based on MVC model. The application is
> deployed on Tomcat and is IE based.

You will want to use HTMLUnit and test your application "from the 
outside" while you are also learning how to test your objects 
individually. This is the easiest place to start.

> First this I want to know is Can I use JUnit to test this
> application.

Yes. I am writing a book about just that, called "JUnit Cookbook". There 
is another one "JUnit in Action" that also discusses how. My book will 
be a companion to "JUnit in Action". Go to http://www.manning.com to 
find out more about this book.

> What kind of applications can be tested through JUnit ?

Any application for which you can create a Java client.
